title: LAP: Freeing Latin America From Erroneous Theses: Homage to Rodolfo Stavenhagen (English)
description: Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors Jan Rus, Arturo Alvarado, and Serena Chew Plascencia on the subject of the March 2018 issue: "Freeing Latin America from Erroneous Theses."
content:encoded: Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors Jan Rus, Arturo Alvarado, and Serena Chew Plascencia on the subject of the March 2018 issue: "Freeing Latin America from Erroneous Theses."
